short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In this spine-chilling first-person shooter, you must try to eliminate the evil horror known as Wendigo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The power and malice of Wendigo are spreading across this once-profitable mining town, turning it into a haunting residence. It's your mission to confront the monstrosity and unlock the secrets of Wendigo (Wendigo)
